name: Soppa Ignario III - Early Access (Free To Play)
name_original: Soppa Ignario III - Early Access (Free To Play)
description:
The Soppa Ignario series started out as a simple web game on Scratch, with 2 games in the main series.

Soppa Ignario III Takes place after the spinoff game, Nogiuli's Mansion and finally concludes the story of the main series.

Soppa Ignario III is a Free to Play, jump and bop style game with a heavy focus on comical characters and fun yet challenging gameplay. (This game is still in development, so it only contains the core elements of the game like physics, sound, basic level design and menus)

The developer Saulsx plans on updating the game every 2 weeks or so, with new features coming in each update!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move, Jump and Crouch

ESCAPE - Pause Game
